channel.title: Visualizing Output from OpenEars TTS – Politepix

item.title: Visualizing Output from OpenEars TTS
item.dc:creator: frogstomper
item.description:
I’m using Version 1.2.5 for TTS and I’d like to be able to visualize audio output as the speech is emitted.

Pretty sure this isn’t an OpenEars-specific question, but Google hasn’t been kind to me in my quest for a way to monitor output real-time. Any leads would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks in advance!

item.title: Reply To: Visualizing Output from OpenEars TTS
item.dc:creator: frogstomper
item.description: Answering my own question – found the spot in the sample app for checking fliteOutputLevel on a separate thread. That’ll do it.

item.title: Reply To: Visualizing Output from OpenEars TTS
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Welcome,

Ah, my favorite kind of support question :) . Glad you found it, let me know if you have other questions.
